version_description:
We removed Halloween decorations in preparation for the happiest season of the year!
Coming very, very soon! Watch out for it!
------
The doctor is in! Another great day in My Town Discovery as we open the Doctor's Office located
at the newly-constructed area! Your citizens will be in better care from now on.
We have included other surprises as well,
play now to check them out!

We removed Halloween decorations in preparation for the happiest season of the year!
Coming very, very soon! Watch out for it!
------
The doctor is in! Another great day in My Town Discovery as we open the Doctor's Office located
at the newly-constructed area! Your citizens will be in better care from now on.
We have included other surprises as well,
play now to check them out!

We fixed glitches and the crash occurred on some of the devices.
------
We removed Halloween decorations in preparation for the happiest season of the year!
Coming very, very soon! Watch out for it!
------
The doctor is in! Another great day in My Town Discovery as we open the Doctor's Office located
at the newly-constructed area! Your citizens will be in better care from now on.
We have included other surprises as well,
play now to check them out!

------
We removed Halloween decorations in preparation for the happiest season of the year!
Coming very, very soon! Watch out for it!
------
The doctor is in! Another great day in My Town Discovery as we open the Doctor's Office located
at the newly-constructed area! Your citizens will be in better care from now on.
We have included other surprises as well,
play now to check them out!

- Postal Office is now open to everyone!
- Fixed some critical crashes on some devices.
- Improved the scratch card animation
- All doors can be opened more easily in town (just tap on the building)
- The Christmas theme is coming next week!

- Postal Office is now open to everyone!
- Fixed some critical crashes on some devices.
- Improved the scratch card animation
- All doors can be opened more easily in town (just tap on the building)
- The Christmas theme is coming next week!

It's Christmas time in my town. With lots of new and exciting things to discover. Visit the new ice skating rink, it's open for everyone! Invite your family to a delicious ice cream at the all new ice-cream store! To celebrate the holiday spirit we have a new Christmas tree, new clothings and a tasty mini game.

We read your emails and fixed some of the issues you guys mentioned:
- Beauty salon hair coloring fix
- Crash fix on some devices
We also did some polish here and there so expect the game to be shinier! Enjoy!

It's Christmas time in my town. With lots of new and exciting things to discover. Visit the new ice skating rink, it's open for everyone! Invite your family to a delicious ice cream at the all new ice-cream store! To celebrate the holiday spirit we have a new Christmas tree, new clothings and a tasty mini game.

We read your emails and fixed some of the issues you guys mentioned:
- Beauty salon hair coloring fix
- Crash fix on some devices
We also did some polish here and there so expect the game to be shinier! Enjoy!

We hope everybody had an awesome holiday!
Some information about this update:
- Xmas is over, decoration and tree removed; don't worry next year they will be back
- We received great feedbacks about how much you loved the ice rink, so we have decided to keep it
- We have some inside information about the new pets coming, check out the My Town Newspaper for more information!
- Optimization and bug fixes. Keep sending us bugs and we shall keep squashing them!

We hope everybody had an awesome holiday!
Some information about this update:
- Xmas is over, decoration and tree removed; don't worry next year they will be back
- We received great feedbacks about how much you loved the ice rink, so we have decided to keep it
- We have some inside information about the new pets coming, check out the My Town Newspaper for more information!
- Optimization and bug fixes. Keep sending us bugs and we shall keep squashing them!

Great news, the new Pet Store and Pet Park are here!
VIP members can now access both new locations!
Non Vip can win access to this location using the scratch cards! Make sure to come back!
We also fixed many things such as the School's blackboard, character animations and much more!

Great news, the new Pet Store and Pet Park are here!
VIP members can now access both new locations!
Non Vip can win access to this location using the scratch cards! Make sure to come back!
We also fixed many things such as the School's blackboard, character animations and much more!

- Pet Park bug fixes
- Clothing bug fixes
- Dance area bug fixed
- Reward screen crash fixed

- Pet Park bug fixes
- Clothing bug fixes
- Dance area bug fixed
- Reward screen crash fixed

- OFFLINE Mode is now available! You can play without the internet! 
- We now support Spanish Language
- Hair machine fixed
- We increased the door navigation arrow sizes

- OFFLINE Mode is now available! You can play without the internet! 
- We now support Spanish Language
- Hair machine fixed
- We increased the door navigation arrow sizes

We know a lot of you are Home because of the virus!
So we opened the Doctor's Office for everyone and updated the game with new Virus Masks. Play safe!

We know a lot of you are Home because of the virus!
So we opened the Doctor's Office for everyone and updated the game with new Virus Masks. Play safe!
We fixed some bugs & crash that may happen on some devices
We fixed some bugs & crash that may happen on some devices

New languages support: Japanese, Chinese, Portuguese, Danish, German.
Fixed some bugs and glitches.

New languages support: Japanese, Chinese, Portuguese, Danish, German.
Fixed some bugs and glitches.

We have a great update!
- Preschool is now open to everyone for a limited time!
- NEW characters & clothes for VIP users!
- Bug fixes.

We have a great update!
- Preschool is now open to everyone for a limited time!
- NEW characters & clothes for VIP users!
- Bug fixes.
You asked, we listened! In this update we’ve added DAY & NIGHT mode, enjoy the new feature and do not forget to leave us a nice review!
You asked, we listened! In this update we’ve added DAY & NIGHT mode, enjoy the new feature and do not forget to leave us a nice review!
Back to school surprise! School is now open to everyone for a limited time and we have a special update for VIP players with cool new charcters and clothes.

- Your new Treehouse is ready! Customise it and invite your favourite characters!

- Halloween special : Lots of spooky visitors are seen around My Town, Ghosts, witches are roaming the streets at night.

Keep sending us requests guys, we read them all!"

We removed Halloween decorations in preparation for the happiest season of the year!
Coming very, very soon! Watch out for it!
In the meantime, we fixed some bugs and updated the Treehouse with cool new items.
